title: Pink cheongsam with metallic shimmer

  physical_appearance: This is a pink cheongsam with very short sleeves. There are light pink patches present throughout the exterior of the outfit. A collar is present on the cheongsam as well.  The collar tag of the cheongsam is visible
 with English words and Chinese characters present on it. There are no visible tears on the cheongsam.

  subject_terms_1: tailor-made dresses (garments) allover patterns

  subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Qipao Custom-made clothing Women\u0027s clothing Patterns for crafts

  subject_terms_3: Ethnic costume Chinese costume

  sgcool_label_text: The cheongsam is made of lurex material
 which has silver thread woven into the fabric. Lurex was a popular choice of fabric for clothing in the 1960s. The shiny effect created by the metallic fibre made the fabric suitable for evening wear dresses. The cheongsam has a Hong Kong-based tailor label
 “Tailor Chu” (?????) and another label that reads “??????”.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a pink cheongsam with very short sleeves. There are light pink patches present throughout the exterior of the outfit. The shiny effect created by the metallic fibre made the fabric suitable for evening wear dresses. The cheongsam has a Hong Kong-based tailor label, “Tailor Chu” (?????) and another label that reads “??????”.
